original_text: You must not try to punish a person who has done something wrong against you. You must not continue to hate a person like that. Instead, you must love other people as much you love yourself. I am the Lord.
korean_text: 원수를 갚지 말며 동포를 원망하지 말며 네 이웃 사랑하기를 네 자신과 같이 사랑하라 나는 여호와이니라

sentences.original_text: You must not try to punish a person
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 사람을 처벌하려고 해서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: who has done something wrong against you
You must not continue to hate a person like that
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그런 사람을 계속 미워해서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: Instead, you must love other people
sentences.korean_translation: 대신, 너는 다른 사람들을 사랑해야 한다

sentences.original_text: as much as you love yourself
